name: Quick Shrimp Scampi
ingredients: 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder, or to taste

instructions.en: Heat the butter in a small skillet.
Add the shrimp and garlic powder to the melted butter.
Cook on high until any watery liquid evaporates and you're left with just a little buttery sauce. Watch closely.
Turn down the heat and season with salt, pepper and cayenne.
Sprinkle with minced fresh parsley before serving.

notes: This recipe makes 1-2 servings. Do not freeze. Nutritional information is provided for both full and half servings.
